page.title: 08Longwell Green Pets
page.content: Out of 114 people interviewed from our school,the{most popular pet}is the cat with 55 owners, followed by fish with 49 owners and 27 people have dogs.Most people spend under one pound on their pets per week, but it can go up to five pounds. We interviewed Ben Norman on his pet python, which is one of the most exotic pets in Longwell Green.It is a black and yellow female Indian Rock snake which is two years old and weighs 600g.Its name is "Sid".It is about 27 cm long and 2 cm thick. It is fed on one live white mouse per week. Kevin Digby's Axolotyl comes from Mexico.It is 175mm long, 25mm wide and the tail is 75mm long.It lives in a glass tank in water.It eats maggots. The tank is cleaned once a month.
